instruction: Describe a character from a movie or TV show.
output: Harry Potter is an iconic character from the Harry Potter series. He is a brave, courageous and kind-hearted wizard who uses his magical skills to stand up for what he believes in. He possesses great strength and loyalty, and is willing to risk everything to save his friends. Harry also has a strong sense of justice and a sense of responsibility. He is a leader and a team player, always striving to help others despite the odds and learning important lessons in the process.
